Pantra took close aim and fired a long beam that hit blade in the 
chest and sent him flying into the forest and out of sight, stalker 
quickly ran into the forest after blade but after a few mins came 
running back "split up and search the area theres no way he can get 
far with that kind of hit" he said transforming into his wolf form 
and jumped into the forest to the east. 

Pantra gave a smile as she walked to the spot Blade was shot in and 
jumped into a tall tree were Blade sat holding his burned chest "u 
could have tryed to make it less painful u know" he said with a laugh 
looking over at pantra as she jumped to the branch next to him
"how else was i going to make it look like i trying to destory u" she 
said sitting down "so now that we got Stalker off our trail whats our 
next move" she said with a smile looking over at Blade
